Title: Encyclopedia of Fishes, 9 vols set
Author: সেলভামানি
Summary:
Fisheries and aquaculture play an important role in the world food economy. The products of fisheries and aquaculture are globally important sources of much needed, high quality, aquatic animal protiens, and invaluable provides of employment, cash income, and foreign exchange. Millions of people depend on fisheries and aquaculture, directly and indirectly, for their livelihoods. Fish is the primary source of protein for some 950 million people worldwide and represents an important part of the diet of many more.

Contents : 
Volume 1 : Marine Capture Fisheries
Volume 2 : Aquaculture: Trends and Issues
Volume 3 : Freshwater Fish Farming
Volume 4 : Fish Farming System
Volume 5 : Small Scale Fisheries
Volume 6 : Fish Harvesting and Processing
Volume 7 : Fish Health and Diseases
Volume 8 : Fish and Fishery Culture: Assessment and Evaluation
Volume 9 : Fisheries Management

Title: Textbook of Angiosperms, 2 vols set
Author: এস. কে. সিং
Summary:
This book entitled "Textbook of Angiosperms" include four parts such as Taxonomy, Anatomy, Embryology and Economic Botany. This is a compilation work and embodies a fairly comprehensive treatment of the fundamental facts and aspects of botany. This book will serve as a standard book for B.Sc. students of three year degree course of all Indian universities. The syllabus recommended by Indian University Grants Commission has been kept in view during the preparation of the book.
Contents : 
Preface
Part 1: TAXONOMY OF ANGIOSPERMS
Part 2: ANATOMY OF ANGIOSPERMS
Part 3: EMBRYOLOGY OF ANGIOSPRMS
Part 4: ECONOMIC BOTANY

Title: An Introduction to Protozoa
Author: সান্ধু
Summary: This book entitled An introduction to Protozoa is one of the phylum series of invertebrates, deals with the morphology, anatomy, physiology and development of important animals of the phylum.

Title: An Introduction to Arthropoda
Author: সান্ধু
Summary: This book entitled "An Introduction to Arthopoda is one of the Phylum series of invertberate, deals with the morpohology, anatomy physiology and development of important animals of the phylum.
